name: Past Demons
text: Give to the Logan player You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Logan → remove Past Demons from the game. • You are stunned and confused. Discard this card.

flavor: My death factor will drain the life from your body!
name: Omega Red
text: Retaliate 1. Steady. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Omega Red attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control.

flavor: Omega Red needs the Carbonadium Synthesizer to prevent his death factor from killing him.
name: The Carbonadium Synthesizer
text: While the Carbonadium Synthesizer is in play, Omega Red cannot be defeated.

name: Death Factor
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Response: After your turn ends, take 1 damage. Alter-Ego Interrupt: When you make a basic recovery, discard this card instead of healing damage.

name: Tentacle Strike
text:
When Revealed: You are stunned. Take 1 damage (4 damage instead if you are already stunned).
[star] Boost: You are stunned. Take 1 damage (4 damage instead if you are already stunned).

flavor: "This time I will carve your heart from your chest!"
name: Lady Deathstrike
text: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After Lady Deathstrike attacks and damages a character, that character's owner discards 1 random card from their hand.

name: Seeking Vengeance
text: When Revealed: If Lady Deathstrike is in play, she activates against you. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Lady Deathstrike and put her into play engaged with you.

name: Adamantium Upgrades
text: Attach to an enemy without a copy of Adamantium Upgrades attached. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star] Attached enemy's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Hack 'n' Slash
text:
When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand and take damage equal to the number of printed resources on it.
[star] Boost: Discard 1 random card from your hand and take damage equal to the number of printed resources on it.
